00026 extern "C" {
00027   #include "stdlib.h"
00028 }
00029 
00030 void randomSeed(unsigned int seed)
00031 {
00032   if (seed != 0) {
00033     srandom(seed);
00034   }
00035 }
00036 
00037 long random(long howbig)
00038 {
00039   if (howbig == 0) {
00040     return 0;
00041   }
00042   return random() % howbig;
00043 }
00044 
00045 long random(long howsmall, long howbig)
00046 {
00047   if (howsmall >= howbig) {
00048     return howsmall;
00049   }
00050   long diff = howbig - howsmall;
00051   return random(diff) + howsmall;
00052 }
00053 
00054 long map(long x, long in_min, long in_max, long out_min, long out_max)
00055 {
00056   return (x - in_min) * (out_max - out_min) / (in_max - in_min) + out_min;
00057 }
00058 
00059 unsigned int makeWord(unsigned int w) { return w; }
00060 unsigned int makeWord(unsigned char h, unsigned char l) { return (h << 8) | l; }
